alert.note: Alert for Allen; Avoyelles; Beauregard; East Cameron; Evangeline; Lafayette; Lower Iberia; Lower St. Martin; Lower St. Mary; Lower Vermilion; Northern Acadia; Northern Calcasieu; Northern Jefferson Davis; Rapides; Southern Acadia; Southern Calcasieu; Southern Jefferson Davis; St. Landry; Upper Iberia; Upper St. Martin; Upper St. Mary; Upper Vermilion; Vernon; West Cameron (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued October 31 at 2:01PM CDT until November 01 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING FOR CENTRAL AND SOUTHERN LOUISIANA THROUGH THIS AFTERNOON AND AGAIN ON WEDNESDAY... .A Canadian high pressure system will continue to build down into the region over the next couple of days, bringing with it a very dry air mass with low afternoon relative humidity values. Also, gusty north winds can be expected through this afternoon and some breezy northeast winds on Wednesday. With recent rainfall light, the area is still in an exceptional drought, and fuels will be critically dry. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY VALUES AND GUSTY NORTH WINDS FOR CENTRAL AND SOUTHERN LOUISIANA... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 7 PM CDT WEDNESDAY FOR LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY VALUES AND GUSTY NORTH WINDS FOR CENTRAL AND SOUTHERN LOUISIANA... The National Weather Service in Lake Charles has issued a Red Flag Warning for low relative humidity and gusty north to northeast winds, which is in effect from 10 AM to 7 PM CDT Wednesday. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * AFFECTED AREA...Vernon, Rapides, Avoyelles, Beauregard, Allen, Evangeline, St. Landry, Lafayette, Upper St. Martin, Lower St. Martin, West Cameron, East Cameron, Northern Calcasieu, Northern Jefferson Davis, Northern Acadia, Upper Vermilion, Upper Iberia, Upper St. Mary, Southern Calcasieu, Southern Jefferson Davis, Southern Acadia, Lower Vermilion, Lower Iberia and Lower St. Mary. * TIMING...Red Flag Warning through 7 pm Tuesday. Red Flag Warning Wednesday 10 am to 7 pm. * WINDS...North 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph through 7 pm Tuesday. North-northeast 10 to 15 mph with gusts up to 20 mph Wednesday 10 am to 7 pm. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...This afternoon as low as 30 to 40 percent. On Wednesday, as low as 20 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fire that develops will likely spread rapidly.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
